code: import{redirect}from"react-router-dom";import{toast}from"react-toastify";import{deleteItem,getAllMatchingItems}from"../helpers";export function deleteBudget(_ref){let{params}=_ref;try{deleteItem({key:"budgets",id:params.id});const associatedExpenses=getAllMatchingItems({category:"expenses",key:"budgetId",value:params.id});associatedExpenses.forEach(expense=>{deleteItem({key:"expenses",id:expense.id});});toast.success("Budget deleted successfully!");}catch(e){throw new Error("There was a problem deleting your budget.");}return redirect("/");}
